Message:
One day, our commander was
exposed for corruption.

Failure and defeat mustn’t exist,
let alone corruption...

Yet, instead of
seeking repentance,
he dismissed it all.

Even now, he sits on
the commander’s chair
like nothing ever happened.

He won’t even reflect on
what he’s done...

Does he have no pride
or conviction as a knight?

I complained about how
his punishment was handled,

thinking it was the right
thing to do.
But in the end...

I don’t understand—
I stood up to corruption,
yet I’m the one being punished?!

No... I can’t let myself
get discouraged.
I am to become a knight—
